gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all notification schemes to understand how notifications are currently configured across projects.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all notification schemes available in the Jira instance.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new notification scheme to customize notifications for a new project.
gold.ideal: Creates a new notification scheme and returns the details of the created scheme.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to see which notification schemes are mapped to my projects to ensure proper notifications are sent.
gold.ideal: Returns a mapping of notification schemes to projects.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to view the details of a specific notification scheme to understand its configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified notification scheme.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I want to update an existing notification scheme to modify the recipients of notifications.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified notification scheme and returns the updated details.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to add new notifications to an existing scheme to ensure that all relevant stakeholders are informed.
gold.ideal: Adds notifications to the specified notification scheme and returns the updated scheme.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to delete an obsolete notification scheme to clean up the system.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified notification scheme and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to remove a specific notification from a scheme to prevent unnecessary alerts.
gold.ideal: Removes the specified notification from the notification scheme and confirms the removal.
